comments.html: Seems to me that RFC2119 applies to life just like it does technology :)  There might be a reason you do something that is beneficial but you better be aware of the consequences.
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: You may classify anything with these. Case in point, I would classify HFT as a bad idea... (High Frequency Trading).
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html:
You MUST mention that a "bad idea" where the "should document" hasn't been documented turns into a "really bad idea" or sometimes even "abomination".

I must also mention that before accepting to implement a "bad idea" you MUST think about a way of getting rid of it, propose it even if it's known to be rejected (at this point you've really done your job), and you SHOULD make people imposing it sign that they accept the implications and drawbacks (so that you can exhibit some bad will later, when things go wrong :) )
